document_data.name: City Guard of Kadarasto
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[Kadarasto]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City Most Sinister".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 2,000 soldiers, 1,000 cavalry, and three 300-man units of [[mamluk]]s of the [[Devout Mamluk Society]]. All of these forces were commanded by Prince [[Nari ibn Aman]].
